fullDescription.intro: Natural join based on matching columns by name. Matching columns must be the same type. There is no outer join, all output values are copied from input rows.
fullDescription.option: Output rows contain all columns from both inputs.
Output rows from the left table that match a row from the right table.
Output rows from the left table that DO NOT match a row from the right table.

ports.outPort: The output table resulting from the join.
